front.title: Perimeter Scan (V)
front.gametext: USED: Play a Defensive Shield from under your Starting Effect. OR Target opponent's just-deployed [Maintenance] card. Target may not battle (or allow opponent to deploy cards from Reserve Deck) for remainder of turn. (Immune to Sense.)  LOST: Cancel Trample (unless targeting an Undercover spy).
front.lore: 'It's a good bet the Empire knows we're here.'

counterpart: Turn It Off! Turn It Off! (V)
